titleStmt.title: A zealous sermon preached at Amsterdam by a Jew whose name is Not-Rvb it being a Hebrew word : you must read his name backward... : text hee that hath eares to heare let him heare / by Iohn Austin.
titleStmt.author: Birchley, William, 1613-1669.

titleStmt.title: A zealous sermon preached at Amsterdam by a Jew whose name is Not-Rvb it being a Hebrew word : you must read his name backward... : text hee that hath eares to heare let him heare / by Iohn Austin.
titleStmt.author: Birchley, William, 1613-1669.

notesStmt.note: William Birchley is a pseud. for John Austin.
A satire on John Burton and his companions.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
